entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
